item.title: firstpost
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: This is the first post and i have no clue what so ever what’s happening. Been typing the about section and now the first post section and am still wondering what’s going to happen to get it to happen. #update Have just seen the youtube «silent movie» style tutorial and published it but nothing is seen yet. WIll come back and test in 15 mins Am back and today it’s the 28th of April and am not making much progress.
